document_data.name: ''The Night the Gods Cursed''
document_data.author: [[Rustarn Horhalloran]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Night the Gods Cursed''''' was a stage play penned by [[Rustarn Horhalloran]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. {{quote|Behold, my lord! More untidy arrivals!
Yet not much is broken, yet,
And this is fair entertainment.|Marauntra the Maid in Act I, Scene IV}}
document_data.History: ''The Night the Gods Cursed'' featured a character named Marauntra the Maid. The play was first performed in the {{YearlinkName|1382}}.
